b'Ocha-ken: Chokotto Monogatari': b"Ocha-ken is a children's program about tea-dogs and tea-cats, each representing a different blend. The episodes are very short and geared to teaching the audience various values. The lesson, or moral of the episode is displayed at the end. \n\n(Source: AniDB)"
